author: gnodet
msg: Refactor ref-list / ref-set recipe, fix cyclic dependency problem with listeners that are not called soon enough, fix collections conversions, fix synchronization issue with managed lists / iterator, fix comparator parsing, fix the grace period, fix the missing dependencies that can be duplicated in events, make sure the blueprint container destruction waits for the container to not be running anymore

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-211. erlang: Modify test_tether to test protocol error handling as well

author: dreiss
msg: Add a client option that causes clients to monitor their creators
and terminate when the creator dies.  This makes it possible to
prevent client leaks without linking, because the latter causes
application code to be killed when a transport error occurs and
